column1: (2/2) Because President Trump has awoken the middle class he’s awoken the flyover country and we are going to continue to prove that we know how to do this in North Dakota.

(1/2) We need to continue to go forward we need to continue to promote freedom liberty and the United States of America. And no matter how this ends in the next days or weeks we are going to continue to move forward. https://t.co/uRjlnDtKYA

Hey ⁦@nytimes⁩ there were no losses. None. I’d say that’s a pretty good job of limiting losses. What a clown show headline. Also congratulations ⁦@laurenboebert⁩. Looking forward to serving with you.  https://t.co/odmkVj8uZ9

Armstrong whose ascent in politics has been steady and marked by success at each stop has adapted quickly and deserves to continue for at least another two years. I would be honored to have your support for another term! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/fEw0nr1O2J

There is a difference between promoting religious liberty and promoting hateful and divisive rhetoric. There is a difference between science and junk science. The NDGOP Anti-LGBT resolution failed to recognize any of these differences. We need to do a lot better.
There is a difference between opposing legislation and opposing people. There is a difference between expressing real serious policy concerns and expressing disdain for people based on who they love.

OTD in 2018:  I accepted the GOP Nomination for U.S. House. I am still humbled by this endorsement and am excited to continue my efforts to fight for North Dakotans.   Learn more about my campaign for re-election here:   https://t.co/vNaCuFqile https://t.co/WMNcPAXePN

Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer have been playing games with small businesses and rural Americans by stalling the #COVID19 bill. We need bipartisanship we need to get a deal done and we need to remember this in November.
